sentences.sentence: “In order to have a society in which public issues can be openly and vigorously debated, ” he wrote, “it is not necessary to allow the brutalization of innocent victims.”
sentences.translation: 他写道：“想要有一个对公共事务进行公开和活跃讨论的社会，并不意味着我们一定要野蛮对待无辜的受害者”。

sentences.sentence: I can't imagine, after all the things I've done to my body and how well it has held up after all the brutalization , asking it to process toxins that it doesn't have to, the vibrant redhead says.
sentences.translation: 在这一切发生后，我不能想象，我曾对自己的身体做了些什么，它竟能抵挡住这所有摧残，要求人体处理它根本无法承受的毒素，声音响亮红头发的Schnur 说。
